title: net: TestDeadlineExpired failure
body:
What steps will reproduce the problem?

go test -v -cpu 1,2,4 -timeout=60m std

What do you see instead?

--- FAIL: TestDeadlineExpired-2 (0.00 seconds)
fd_posix_test.go:54: expire failed: expected false, actual true

Which compiler are you using (5g, 6g, 8g, gccgo)?

6g

Which operating system are you using?

linux

Which version are you using?  (run 'go version')

go version devel +99056a2a8a9d Mon Sep 02 16:44:51 2013 +0900 linux/amd64
